_sText:
" Numa pequena aldeia onde todos pensavam que era seguro viver, foi criado um laboratório de genética onde um virus escapou...... e tudo mudou.
Consegues pôr um fim ao Inferno?"

This is a map that I'm creating for Counter Strike Source ZombieMod.

"In a small village where everybody thought it was safe to live, was created a genetics lab where a virus has escaped ...... and everything changed.
Can you put an end to this hell? "


*No Download já tens a versão normal e a versão para o fast download :)

*In the Download you already have the normal and the fast download version of the map :)
